FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Whole again in honor and horn.
Di nuovo intero, in corna e onore.
Enfin complet par honneur et par corne.
Nuevamente completo, en honor y en cuernos.
名誉と角を再びすべて取り戻す。
Whole again in honor and horn.
И вот опять он цел и невредим, почет ему и слава.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {2}{d}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
{2}{d}, {T}: Metti in gioco una pedina creatura Guerriero Elfo 1/1 bianca e verde.
{2}{d}, {T}: Bringe einen 1/1 grünen und weißen (Elf, Krieger)-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
{2}{d}, {T} : Mettez en jeu un jeton de créature 1/1 verte et blanche Elfe et Guerrier.
{2}{d}, {T}: Pon en juego una ficha de criatura Guerrero Elfo verde y blanca 1/1.
{2}{d}, {T}：緑であり白である１/１のエルフ・戦士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体場に出す。
{2}{d}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
{2}{d}, {T}: положите в игру одну фишку существа 1/1 зеленый и белый Эльф Воин.
{2}{d}, {T}: Coloque em jogo uma ficha de criatura verde e branca 1/1 do tipo Elfo Guerreiro.
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_ELF_WARRIOR_1_1_GW_888280316", token_count, EffectController() ) end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {4}{d}{d}, {T}: For each creature token you control, put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield.
{4}{d}{d}, {T}: Per ogni pedina creatura che controlli, metti in gioco una pedina che è una copia di quella creatura.
{4}{d}{d}, {T}: Bringe für jeden Kreaturenspielstein, den du kontrollierst, einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie dieser Kreatur ist.
{4}{d}{d}, {T} : Pour chaque jeton de créature que vous contrôlez, mettez en jeu un jeton qui est une copie de cette créature.
{4}{d}{d}, {T}: Por cada ficha de criatura que controles, pon en juego una ficha que es una copia de esa criatura.
{4}{d}{d}, {T}：あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー・トークン１体につき、そのクリーチャーのコピーであるトークンを１体場に出す。
{4}{d}{d}, {T}: For each creature token you control, put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield.
{4}{d}{d}, {T}: за каждую фишку существа под вашим контролем положите в игру одну фишку, являющуюся копией того существа.
{4}{d}{d}, {T}: Para cada ficha de criatura que você controla, coloque em jogo uma ficha que seja uma cópia daquela criatura.
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY and FilteredCard():IsToken() == 1 and FilteredCard():GetPlayer() == Object():GetPlayer())
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlayFromSpec( FilteredCard():GetSpec(), 1, EffectController() ) end
